job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior AI Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a full-stack AI wizard ready to redefine the frontier of K-12 learning? Join the education revolution at 2 Hour Learning!

   At 2 Hour Learning, we're not just talking about transforming education - we're proving it with hard data. Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics to create a digital learning environment that's twice as effective as traditional schooling. High schoolers ace AP exams, middle schoolers advance 2 grade levels per year, and even kindergarteners shatter learning goals.

   You'll play a pivotal role in architecting this AI-powered learning revolution. You'll wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools that engage students and drive learning efficiency to unprecedented heights.

   This isn't a role for AI dabblers or back-end-only coders. We seek bold AI architects who can seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences. You'll own and optimize the entire product lifecycle, partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs., * Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
     * Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
     * Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
     * Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Coding narrow AI features in isolation of overarching product goals and learner needs
     * Implementing AI in a superficial, "buzzwordy" way that doesn't drive material learning gains
     * Toiling away at small-scale internal demos; your applications will drive learning impact for thousands
     * Waiting for others to define product requirements or conduct user research; you'll lead the charge
     * Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency, Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_details.full_text:
Senior AI Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a full-stack AI wizard ready to redefine the frontier of K-12 learning? Join the education revolution at 2 Hour Learning!

   At 2 Hour Learning, we're not just talking about transforming education - we're proving it with hard data. Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics to create a digital learning environment that's twice as effective as traditional schooling. High schoolers ace AP exams, middle schoolers advance 2 grade levels per year, and even kindergarteners shatter learning goals.

   You'll play a pivotal role in architecting this AI-powered learning revolution. You'll wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools that engage students and drive learning efficiency to unprecedented heights.

   This isn't a role for AI dabblers or back-end-only coders. We seek bold AI architects who can seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences. You'll own and optimize the entire product lifecycle, partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs., * Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
     * Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
     * Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
     * Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Coding narrow AI features in isolation of overarching product goals and learner needs
     * Implementing AI in a superficial, "buzzwordy" way that doesn't drive material learning gains
     * Toiling away at small-scale internal demos; your applications will drive learning impact for thousands
     * Waiting for others to define product requirements or conduct user research; you'll lead the charge
     * Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency, Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building user-facing applications powered by generative AI, including fine-tuning, RAG, and integrating AI across the full-stack. The core responsibilities align with developing and deploying production-grade AI systems that directly impact users, fitting the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.phrase: redefine the frontier of K-12 learning
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the business domain (education) and a strategic goal of innovation within it.

job_tasks.phrase: Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics to create a digital learning environment that's twice as effective as traditional schooling.
job_tasks.justification: This demonstrates an understanding of the business's core value proposition and the scientific principles underpinning it.

job_tasks.phrase: partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the importance of understanding and meeting the needs of the end-users (learners) and collaborating with business stakeholders.

job_tasks.phrase: Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes collaboration with stakeholders to ensure technical development meets business objectives and user needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Coding narrow AI features in isolation of overarching product goals and learner needs
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states what is NOT desired, implying that alignment with product goals and learner needs is crucial.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementing AI in a superficial, "buzzwordy" way that doesn't drive material learning gains
job_tasks.justification: Reinforces the need for AI implementation to be tied to tangible business outcomes (learning gains).

job_tasks.phrase: Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency
job_tasks.justification: Connects technical efficiency (AI-powered testing) to business goals (maximizing development velocity and robustness).

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement of the business objective and the desired impact of the AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics
job_tasks.justification: While not explicit data pipeline building, 'harnesses' implies the use and integration of data derived from learning science and psychometrics, which often requires data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: architecting this AI-powered learning revolution
job_tasks.justification: Implies designing and building AI systems, which is a core part of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools
job_tasks.justification: Envisioning and coding AI tools points to the development and adaptation of models.

job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences
job_tasks.justification: Weaving AI across different layers suggests the application and integration of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to working with generative AI technologies and integrating them, which is a core modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness
job_tasks.justification: This implies using AI for tasks like automated testing and debugging, which can involve model-based approaches.

job_tasks.phrase: full-stack AI wizard
job_tasks.justification: Indicates a need for expertise across the entire software stack, including AI components.

job_tasks.phrase: architecting this AI-powered learning revolution
job_tasks.justification: Architecting implies designing and building software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions coding and shipping full-stack applications and tools.

job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI into the full software development lifecycle, from front-end to back-end.

job_tasks.phrase: Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
job_tasks.justification: This covers the entire software development lifecycle, emphasizing ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to the development and delivery of applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
job_tasks.justification: The 'launch and iterative enhancement' aspects of the product lifecycle strongly imply operational concerns for deployed AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness
job_tasks.justification: AI-driven automation in testing and debugging is a key aspect of modern MLOps for ensuring robust deployments.

job_tasks.phrase: Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency
job_tasks.justification: Focus on efficient and automated testing, a critical component of MLOps for production systems.

technologies.justification: General mention of AI tools, which often implies frameworks for building AI applications.
Suggests the use of AI frameworks or libraries to automate processes.

soft_skills.phrase: redefine the frontier of K-12 learning
soft_skills.justification: Indicates a drive for innovation and pushing boundaries.
Highlights the expectation of independent work and creative problem-solving.
Directly states the expectation of taking ownership of the entire product lifecycle.
Demonstrates a proactive approach to collaboration and driving projects forward.
Emphasizes a proactive and innovative mindset.
Suggests a focus on solving complex problems in education using AI.

soft_skills.phrase: drive learning efficiency to unprecedented heights
soft_skills.justification: Focuses on achieving tangible, high-impact results.
Indicates a pragmatic approach to optimizing development processes for efficiency and quality.

soft_skills.phrase: demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency
soft_skills.justification: Highlights a results-oriented approach focused on measurable impact.
Indicates the need for effective communication and collaboration with various parties.
Requires understanding and communicating learner needs to the development team.

soft_skills.phrase: Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech
soft_skills.justification: Shows a need to stay updated and adapt to new technologies in a fast-evolving field.
Implies adapting to and driving change in the education sector through AI.
